theRhythmGirl:MandrillStrike.NAME: Mandrill Strike
theRhythmGirl:MandrillStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL therhythmgirl:On_Beat 3: Deal !M! damage instead.

theRhythmGirl:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
theRhythmGirl:Metronome.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 hp. Add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theRhythmGirl:Metronome.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose 1 hp. Add a copy of this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRhythmGirl:FlipperRolls.NAME: Flipper Roll
theRhythmGirl:FlipperRolls.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.
theRhythmGirl:FlipperRolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

theRhythmGirl:MonkeySeeMonkeyDo.NAME: Monkey Business
theRhythmGirl:MonkeySeeMonkeyDo.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
theRhythmGirl:MonkeySeeMonkeyDo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a copy of a card from your discard pile into your hand.

theRhythmGirl:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
theRhythmGirl:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn gains therhythmgirl:Repeat.

theRhythmGirl:OddFlamingo.NAME: Odd Flamingo
theRhythmGirl:OddFlamingo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies except the targeted enemy.

theRhythmGirl:SeeSaw.NAME: See Saw
theRhythmGirl:SeeSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy that did not take damage this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: That enemy already took damage this turn.

theRhythmGirl:Pitch.NAME: Pitch
theRhythmGirl:Pitch.DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1: Add a [#e3be4e]Home [#e3be4e]Run to your hand.
theRhythmGirl:Pitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1: Add a [#e3be4e]Home [#e3be4e]Run+ to your hand.

theRhythmGirl:Ready.NAME: Rea--dy
theRhythmGirl:Ready.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 additional therhythmgirl:Beat. Draw a card.

theRhythmGirl:NeverGiveUp.NAME: Never Give Up
theRhythmGirl:NeverGiveUp.DESCRIPTION: Restore !M! % of NL your Max HP. NL Permanently remove this card from your deck.

theRhythmGirl:BuiltToScale.NAME: Built To Scale
theRhythmGirl:BuiltToScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your therhythmgirl:Measure.
theRhythmGirl:BuiltToScale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to twice your therhythmgirl:Measure.

theRhythmGirl:FishingRod.NAME: Fishing Rod
theRhythmGirl:FishingRod.DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1: add a [#e3be4e]Pausegill to your hand. NL Gain 1 additional therhythmgirl:Beat.
theRhythmGirl:FishingRod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1: add a [#e3be4e]Pausegill+ to your hand. NL Gain 1 additional therhythmgirl:Beat.

theRhythmGirl:PoseForTheFans.NAME: Pose For The Fans
theRhythmGirl:PoseForTheFans.DESCRIPTION: Lose all therhythmgirl:Measure. Gain Strength equal to the amount of therhythmgirl:Measure lost this way.
theRhythmGirl:PoseForTheFans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all therhythmgirl:Measure. Gain Strength equal to the amount of therhythmgirl:Measure lost this way. NL Grave.

theRhythmGirl:LaunchParty.NAME: Launch Party
theRhythmGirl:LaunchParty.DESCRIPTION: After you've gained 3 therhythmgirl:Beats, deal !M! damage.

theRhythmGirl:PartyCracker.NAME: Party Cracker
theRhythmGirl:PartyCracker.DESCRIPTION: After you've gained !theRhythmGirl:MagicNumber2! therhythmgirl:Beats, deal !M! damage. Double the damage each turn this effect is delayed.

theRhythmGirl:SpaceBell.NAME: Space Bell
theRhythmGirl:SpaceBell.DESCRIPTION: After you've gained 7 therhythmgirl:Beats, everyone gains !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

theRhythmGirl:CoffeeBreak.NAME: Coffee Break
theRhythmGirl:CoffeeBreak.DESCRIPTION: You cannot gain therhythmgirl:Beats until end of turn.
theRhythmGirl:CoffeeBreak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You cannot gain therhythmgirl:Beats until end of turn. NL Draw a card.

theRhythmGirl:CountIn.NAME: Count In
theRhythmGirl:CountIn.DESCRIPTION: Put a card with an therhythmgirl:On [#e3be4e]Beat[] effect from your draw pile into your hand. Gain therhythmgirl:Beats until you can play that card.
theRhythmGirl:CountIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put a card with an therhythmgirl:On [#e3be4e]Beat[] effect from your draw pile into your hand. Gain therhythmgirl:Beats until you can play that card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have no cards with #rOn #rBeat effects in my draw pile.

theRhythmGirl:RhythmHeaven.NAME: Rhythm Heaven
theRhythmGirl:RhythmHeaven.DESCRIPTION: This turn, therhythmgirl:On_Beat effects always trigger regardless of your current therhythmgirl:Beat.
theRhythmGirl:RhythmHeaven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, therhythmgirl:On_Beat effects always trigger regardless of your current therhythmgirl:Beat.

theRhythmGirl:BossaNova.NAME: Bossa Nova
theRhythmGirl:BossaNova.DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1 or 3: NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL therhythmgirl:On_Beat 2 or 4: NL Gain !B! Block.

theRhythmGirl:Screwbot.NAME: Screwbot
theRhythmGirl:Screwbot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1 or 3: NL Apply !M! Weak. NL therhythmgirl:On_Beat 2 or 4: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theRhythmGirl:PeaFlick.NAME: Pea Flick
theRhythmGirl:PeaFlick.DESCRIPTION: therhythmgirl:On_Beat 1 or 2: Add a [#e3be4e]Pea [#e3be4e]Fork to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRhythmGirl:Pterodactyl.NAME: Pterodactyl
theRhythmGirl:Pterodactyl.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least !M! therhythmgirl:Measures. NL Deal !D! damage.

theRhythmGirl:SquareShoulders.NAME: Square Shoulders
theRhythmGirl:SquareShoulders.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage damage equal to your therhythmgirl:Measure squared.
